c3 m1

c2 m1

Margins and padding

Classes:

  • .mt - Margin top
  • .mb - Margin bottom
  • .pt - Padding top
  • .pb - Padding bottom
  • .mt-half, .mb-half, .pt-half, pb-half - halves padding or margin from above
  • .mt-double ... with above variations - doubles padding or margin from above
  • .mt-triple ... with above variations - triples padding or margin from above
